titleStmt.title: Two speeches delivered before the subscribing of the Covenant, the 25. of September, at St. Margarets in Westminster the one by Mr. Philip Nye, the other by Mr. Alexander Henderson.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Philip, 1596?-1672.
Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
